name: Pillage & Plunder
description:
Pillage & Plunder is a simple, fantasy-themed, fully-fledged real-time strategy game, featuring exploration, base and unit construction, resource management, unit upgrades, a basic technology tree, and combat. Four scenarios against an artificially intelligent adversary are available to play so far.

The game contains one playable race, five different types of building, and three different types of unit.

Pillage & Plunder was primarily designed as a proof of concept for a real-time strategy game made in Game Maker 8.1.

Pillage & Plunder is now open source under the GNU GPL - you can find the source code here: https://github.com/shedeen2109/Pillage-Plunder
